How to Grad School - February 22, 2016
The key difference between graduate school and undergraduate school is how much every decision you make towards your degree matters. If you are not going to grad school with a clear sense of purpose, you should not be there.
Tags: humor, graduate school, Master's degree, advice, after school, career, applications

Forty Journeys in a Silent Room - January 12, 2016
I attended a six day long meditation retreat with about 40 participants. We would start meditating as a group at 8AM and leave 13 hours later. As is normal in meditation retreats, this was all done in silence.
Tags: worthful, emotions, meditation, retreat, long retreat, silence, sitting
